creditline: Gift of Adam Zagorin and Perez Zagorin
description: painting on six pieces of paper of various sizes, taped together; turquoise ground; woman in yellow waitress uniform being lifting by her blonde hair, entwined in an egg beater held by a flying brunette woman wearing a red dress with pink feathered wings in ULQ; razor blade inside a pink circle with radiating white circles, URQ; long dock with a small white dog, fish, two white clams, lobster, and a pole with a net
inscription: on back in pencil: HS626 / (crossed out) HS / (crossed out) 35.3
title: Study for "Resurrection of the Waitress"
